code:
flowchart TD
    A[Client API] --> B[Gin Router]
    B --> C[Auth Handler]
    B --> D[Profile Handler]
    B --> E[Post Handler]

    C --> F[Auth Usecase]
    D --> G[Profile Usecase]
    E --> H[Post Usecase]

    F --> I[User Repository]
    G --> J[Profile Repository]
    H --> K[Post Repository]

    I --> L[Master DB - Write]
    I --> M[Slave DB - Read]
    J --> L
    J --> M
    K --> L
    K --> M

    L --> N[Replication]
    N --> M
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
